item.description: This meetup is another alternative for getting together. The plan is to have a definite meeting each month on the first Thursday. Wanting to give others who can't do weeknights a daytime alternative, and we'll see how that goes. So far, it's going really well!

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Daytime Meetup
